title: New York State of Crime: Two Men in a Cell | 4
description:
Preet Bharara investigates Sheldon Silver and Dean Skelos - the explosive trials and the aftermath.

You can read more about the Sheldon Silver trial here, and read about the Dean Skelos trial here.
